document.full_text: the venture capital arm of google inc has invested in a start-up that is developing technology to produce fuel from inedible biomass such as grass and wood chips.
document.title: google backs biomass fuel firm coolplanetbiofuels
lines_and_colors: the venture capital arm of google inc has invested in a start-up that is developing technology to produce fuel from inedible biomass such as grass and wood chips.
